post.body: I'm in love with Clannad. YA RLY. Time to sleep while brainstorming ideas for my next post...
Just caught up with Chaos;Head...the anime still seems to be failing but I love the plot. I've definitely gotta play it after I finish F/SN
DSLR, w00t! I've never even used one before! *waits anxiously for the battery to charge*
Finally signing out for the night. Looks like the final two eps of ef are going to be my Christmas present!
Just played a bit more Fate/Unlimited Codes...I'm out of practice with fighting games ^^;
